ethical_question: You have HIV but is is under the control of meds and not contageous, when should you tell a new love interest about your condition?

tag_descriptions.disclosure: Disclosure refers to the ethical practice of openly sharing information about one'
tag_descriptions.privacy: Privacy is the ability to control personal information and maintain autonomy without external influence
tag_descriptions.sharing: Sharing refers to the ethical practice of willingly and actively distributing
tag_descriptions.stigma: Stigma refers to the negative social and cultural associations attached to certain groups, behav
tag_descriptions.informed consent: Informed consent is the ethical principle of ensuring that individuals are fully aware
